name: The Comfy Talks
description: Get a newsletter about self-care, lifestyle, and online money-making directly in your inbox. Hey there! This is a free Gumroad newsletter called The Comfy Talks, run by me. In this newsletter, I talk about self-care tips, lifestyle, my creator's life, favorites, and online money-making ideas. With that, you'll also get access to all my freebies in your inbox. How to subscribe the newsletter? Put $0 in the place of the price and click on subscribe. Who Am I? This is Poonam Sharma. I'm a Notion cr
